description:
The slaves need to make up for their poor performance on Wednesday, so the Steward decides to remind them of their place on the Upper Floor.
Odile, Krysta, and Buffy (aka Ariel X) are given specific new duties to perform throughout the evening.
We cover some basic protocol for the newer slaves, and o is made an example of and tormented in front of the entire House. Buffy is bound to a table and made to endure every guest of the House fucking her with a massive dildo.
title: Refining the slaves
